Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item is worth $15000 to you, and we're eager to make it yours. To facilitate this transaction, I propose a price of $14500. This offer includes all the features you're looking for and more, ensuring a seamless experience tailored to your requirements. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you'd like to proceed with this offer. We value your business and look forward to serving you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
